item.title: About
item.description: In my daytime, I work as a Developer Advocate at a US Tech company. At night, I’m a content creator developing tutorials in data science for the following platforms: ğŸ“º YouTube: Data Professor, Coding Professor ğŸ“ Medium Blogs. ğŸ’» GitHub In my previous role, I was an Associate Professor of Bioinformatics carrying out research in computational drug discovery: Google Scholar ORCID SCOPUS ResearchGate GitHub: chaninn, chaninlab You can also connect with me at the following social platforms:
